pageProduct.name: QV Gentle Wash 1.25Kg
pageProduct.description:
General Information

QV Gentle Wash is a gentle soap- free cleanser suitable for normal and sensitive skin. It works to help maintain hydration during cleansing so skin is left clean and feeling soft. It is also non-comedogenic so it won’t block pores. Recommended by dermatologists.

Warnings

Avoid eyes. For external use only. If lather enters eyes, rinse with clean water. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Store below 30°C.

Common Uses

• Recommended for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Contains added moisturisers.
• Helps maintain the skin’s natural protective properties.
• Doesn’t strip away natural oils on the skin.
• pH balanced, low-irritant formulation, free from soap, colour, fragrance, propylene glycol, and lanolin.
• Suitable for sensitive skin.

Ingredients

Aqua (water), glycerin, sodium lauroyl sarcosinate, disodium cocoamphodiacetate, lauroyl betaine, sodium cocoyl isethionate, acrylates/C10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer, styrene/acrylates copolymer, aminomethyl propanol, methylparaben propylparaben.

Directions

Use daily to wash face, hands and body. Apply desired amount of QV Gentle Wash to wet skin and lightly massage. Rinse and gently pat skin dry. For best results apply QV Skin Lotion or QV Cream immediately after using. For persistent dry or sensitive skin try QV Bath Oil.
